department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: relating to the God Vishnu; lampas weave structure; red ground with bands of animal, vegetable, bird-like figures and bands with script-like patterns; selvage edge left hand side
text: This fragment is from a group of court textiles that have only recently been rediscovered. Most of these texiles use red as a major design element and feature imagery related to Vishnu, the Hindu god of preservation.
title: Vaishnavite Fragment
